description.plain: Young Smoke is rapper from Toronto. Smoke Dawg was his older brother.

body.plain: Young Smoke is rapper from Toronto. Smoke Dawg was his older brother.

songs.lyrics:
8 ContributorsDays By Da Rabba Lyrics[Intro]
Buss it down
Smokey's world
Ano Gang
Ahwoolay

[Chorus]
Came through drippin’ like a crack in the ceiling
I came through bless, like I just finna sneeze 'em
My bitch, she a dime, no, I won't leave her
She go up and down like a lever
Louboutin’s made my feet hurt
I got bands in the Beamer
She just want all these drugs, I make love to my heater
Nah, she don't want no more friends
No, she just wants some more Kenzo
We make love in the Benzo
Set up shops like it's FreshCo
Gettin' guap, no more wearin' friends clothes
All paid for, no more rentals
On your mark, shordy said, "Let go"
On your mark, shordy said, "Let go"
[Verse 1]
Made a hundred bands on a Koodo
Play my cards just right like Uno
You can not get in, that's a two-door
Run up on me and I turn his brain into noodles
Run up on him, let the semi-auto speak
I'ma take this to the grave with me
VVS chains with me
Came a long way from slavery
Like, I've been going hard, gettin’ no sleep
Like, pass me the blunt, yeah, no coffee
This big shotty in my jean, give me [?]
Run ’em down, hit him, tuna roll like ah ee
I've been grindin’ like I'm Tony
Halal boy, but I leave you holy
Picked up your bitch in a stollie
Whip up my wrist, hit the Rollie
Lost my tooth today, I'ma go get a gold teeth
Lost my bro, so I can never trust nobody
Tryna get out the hood and go see some palm trees
I was in the trap and I ain't get nobody
I was spendin’ my money and I was fuckin' up my re'
I was skippin' to that loom, and I was chasin' all this cheese
I was all by myself and I asked, "God, please help"

[Chorus]
Came through drippin' like a crack in the ceiling
I came through bless, like I just finna sneeze 'em
My bitch, she a dime, no, I won't leave her
She go up and down like a lever
Louboutin's made my feet hurt
I got bands in the Beamer
She just want all these drugs, I make love to my heater
Nah, she don't want no more friends
No, she just wants some more Kenzo
We make love in the Benzo
Set up shops like it's FreshCo
Gettin' guap, no more wearin' friends clothes
All paid for, no more rentals
On your mark, shordy said, "Let go"
On your mark, shordy said, "Let go"
You might also like[Verse 2]
I bought a cake
I started hittin' like the Jays
I'm tryna move momma away
When I call, they come like ándale
When you pull up, we ain't hear what you say
We tryna go overseas and see couple pounds
I'm goin' up, ain't comin' down
I am the king, I might give her the crown, I might go hit the block, yeah, if that don't work out
I might buy a Rollie, and go bust down
My bitch, yeah, she love the one
Now, that I'm hot and I'm buzzin' around, the cops say that I'm the one
Didn't go to school, but I know how to count (Count it)
Water on me and I look like a fountain with thousands

[Chorus]
Came through drippin' like a crack in the ceiling
I came through bless, like I just finna sneeze 'em
My bitch she a dime, no, I won't leave her
She go up and down like a lever
Louboutin's made my feet hurt
I got bands in the Beamer
She just want all these drugs, I make love to my heater
Nah, she don't want no more friends
No, she just wants some more Kenzo
We make love in the Benzo
Set up shops like it's FreshCo

Some Southside shit, though, you know how we rockin', niggaEmbed

songs.title: Smokey World

description.plain: “Smokey World” is a bonus track on Smoke Dawg’s posthumous debut album “Struggle Before Glory.” This is the only song on the album that doesn’t feature Smoke Dawg on it. Instead this whole track is done by his younger brother Young Smoke.

songs.embed_content: Read “Smokey World” by Young Smoke on Genius

album.full_title: Struggle Before Glory by Smoke Dawg
album.name: Struggle Before Glory

body.plain: “Smokey World” is a bonus track on Smoke Dawg’s posthumous debut album “Struggle Before Glory.” This is the only song on the album that doesn’t feature Smoke Dawg on it. Instead this whole track is done by his younger brother Young Smoke.

songs.lyrics:
9 ContributorsSmokey World Lyrics[Intro]
Smokey's World
Ano Gang
Ahwoolay!

[Chorus]
If you ask me that lil' bitch is trippin'
She see us winnin', we ballin' like Wiggins
Broski, I bet she wants me to hit it
I play hard to get, so she say that I rigged it
I don't care what nobody gotta say
Your shit will get laced if you don't fuckin' stay paid
And if you ain't fuckin' with Halal, then that problem could easily get solved
Ahwoolay!
[Refrain]
My drip, my sauce, my flow, that's some southside shit
Big bro was there for me, so I gotta be there for his kid
My hitter he shoot for free, I ain't even gotta pay for the hit
Pull up with a drum on me, and you know what we rockin' wit'

[Verse 1]
Leave you where you lay
Trap out where you stay
As long as mom's straight, and the gang it stay paid
We got the juice, we shippin' crates
Smokey and 10K and my big bro Ace
For NSK, yeah, we do it bare face
Pull up, we sprayin', you'll think it's bear mace
Ain't no discussion, ain't nothin' to say

[Chorus]
If you ask me that lil' bitch is trippin'
She see us winnin', we ballin' like Wiggins
Broski, I bet she wants me to hit it
I play hard to get, so she say that I rigged it
I don't care what nobody gotta say
Your shit will get laced if you don't fuckin' stay paid
And if you ain't fuckin' with Halal, then that problem could easily get solved
Ahwoolay!
You might also like[Refrain]
My drip, my sauce, my flow, that's some southside shit
My drip, my sauce, my flow, that's some southside shit
Big bro was there for me, so I gotta be there for his kid
Pull up with a drum on me, and you know what we rockin' wit'

[Verse 2]
I'm where I wanna be
Now that I'm up, don't say that you wanted me
Kicked out the next morning, sorry, you gotta leave
Versace on my feet
These niggas, they copy me
These hoes, they swallow me
My shooter cock it back, and slap like a hockey team
Rollie but I need a Patek Philippe
Momma tryna save me
But she don't know that I'm in too deep
Demons always tryna fight in my sleep
He want beef, take him off of the street
Pull up like Iverson holdin' that three
Me and Smokey had that hoe on her knees
You know we some GOAT's, and we don't follow sheep

[Chorus]
If you ask me that lil' bitch is trippin'
She see us winnin', we ballin' like Wiggins
Broski, I bet she wants me to hit it
I play hard to get, so she say that I rigged it
I don't care what nobody gotta say
Your shit will get laced if you don't fuckin' stay paid
And if you ain't fuckin' with Halal, then that problem could easily get solved
Ahwoolay!Embed

songs.title: 4 Tha Streetz
songs.embed_content: Read “4 Tha Streetz” by Young Smoke on Genius
songs.lyrics:
5 Contributors4 Tha Streetz Lyrics[Intro]
(Aight, Walcott)
Let's go

[Chorus]
I feel like Wop '06, bitch
Can't come for you, I'ma send Lyft
If I was down bad, I was down bad, now I'm rich
I could afford Phipps
Put it on your head, I could afford flips
Ten lil' B's ain't shit, come get it
Ate some words, nah, should've never said it, nah
My slime like Thug, we like Baby and Dugg
And she just want hugs, ain't no love for the streets
I got love for my heat, we ain't shooting at feet
We ain't staying off-beat, we drop hits and repeat
My slime like lizard, neck on blizzard
Buzzin' in the city, nah, I ain't even been there
Fuck up a check, give two fucks 'bout my ex
Put on my chain 'cause it's funner to flex
[Verse]
I did a lot, don't forget
Pull up like wet
Shooting like movies at sets
Hit for hit, body death for death
Hit above waist, any place above the chest
This is the best, nothing I'll ever regret
Roll the dice, life is a bet
Give me a break, give me some rest
Cut off my hoes, told 'em, "Don't need stress"
Bumps and bruises, I gotta pick up the money, let's hop in the ride, let's cruise in
Picking and choosing, roster looking like some all-stars, nah, we ain't been losing
I could flex, no need for rest, no snoozing
I need a dub, roll it up
I flood my neck, flood it up
Seen someone upset, told 'em stop watchin', streamin' lifestyle, got wild
This a show-out
Took me a while, like, told her, "Sit down"
Same lil' bitch that dissed, now she want this and she wanna go have my child
Come here lil' ho, I'm signed, get guap
I was down bottom but aimed at his top
He is LeBron, the way that he flopped
Dog, feelin' like Guwop, uh

[Chorus]
I feel like Wop '06, bitch
Can't come for you, I'ma send Lyft
If I was down bad, I was down bad, now I'm rich
I could afford Phipps
Put it on your head, I could afford flips
Ten lil' B's ain't shit, come get it
Ate some words, nah, should've never said it, nah
My slime like Thug, we like Baby and Dugg
And she just want hugs, ain't no love for the streets
I got love for my heat, we ain't shooting at feet
We ain't staying off-beat, we drop hits and repeat
My slime like lizard, neck on blizzard
Buzzin' in the city, nah, I ain't even been there
Fuck up a check, give two fucks 'bout my ex
Put on my chain 'cause it's funner to flexYou might also likeEmbed
